headline: IFF Extends Enviva® PRO Probiotic Range to Improve Swine Welfare
summary: IFF (NYSE:IFF) today announced the extension of their three-strain Bacillus probiotic, Enviva® PRO, to pigs. By incorporating IFF's probiotic into their diet, producers will be better positioned to protect their animals against diverse health challenges. The extension of Enviva® PRO enhances IFF's robust portfolio of proven, cost-effective animal nutrition and health solutions that help customers optimize production, livability and profitability.
